name: Rolling Papers 2
content: Do this sh*t for my son my son
Turned the fam in my squad
And turn this thing into something
I grab a cone and I stuff it
Lost some people to get here
But they watching us from up above
On the road hardly ever home
And money caught one in the dome
Leave me alone I'll be in my zone
Too grown to let my feelings show
Anything you want you can get
I blew up quick and lost some sh*t
Good or wrong just do the best
And do what he gotta do
Baby this is rolling papers two
When it's time to make a change
I ain't gonna fight it fight it
When it's time to make a change
I ain't gonna fight it fight it
The clothes the cars the girls
But all the sh*t in the world
On the verge packing up and
Going back to where I came from
I only run in the lane once
We all f**king the same ones
I ain't giving chances no more
Getting money you better save some
Don't be afraid to make mistakes
It takes time but a man gon be
A man and do what he gotta do
Baby this is rolling papers two
When it's time to make a change
I ain't gonna fight it fight it
When it's time to make a change
I ain't gonna fight it fight it
No turning back I'm learning that
If you ever show someone love
If you got a ounces of paper
And if you ever do takes a loss
You gon get there if you work hard
I want more couple cars in my garage
Above it all open my doors
Hoop court where my friends could ball
I hit the road when I get the car
It pays off 'cause a man gon be
A man and do what he gotta do
Baby this is rolling papers two
When it's time to make a change
I ain't gonna fight it fight it
When it's time to make a change
I ain't gonna fight it fight it
